findings.rationale: Absence of indemnification obligations may expose parties to significant liabilities without recourse.
findings.evidence_quote: No indemnification obligations apply under this Agreement.

findings.rationale: Limiting liability to total fees paid may not cover all potential damages, creating financial risk.
findings.evidence_quote: Each party's liability under this Agreement is limited to the total fees paid hereunder.

findings.rationale: Lack of audit rights can hinder the ability to verify compliance and protect confidential information.
findings.evidence_quote: No audit rights are granted under this Agreement.

findings.rationale: Absence of IP provisions may lead to unclear ownership and use of intellectual property created during the agreement.
The Receiving Party bearing attorney fees may discourage disputes but could be financially burdensome.
findings.evidence_quote: The Receiving Party shall pay all attorneys' fees and costs incurred by the Disclosing Party in enforcing this Agreement.
